entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: E 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Ice pellets or snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets and snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing rain or flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of freezing drizzle. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
